sections.heading: for rabies; cost; payment.The cost of rabies vaccination shall be borne by the owner of the domestic or hybrid animal

sections.text:
71-4404.Vaccination for rabies; cost; payment.

The cost of rabies vaccination shall be borne by the owner of the domestic or hybrid animal.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 445, § 4, p. 1486;Laws 1987, LB 104, § 4;Laws 2007, LB25, § 6.
